blueprint.description: Installs Peek, a GIF screen recorder with an easy to use interface, on Linux systems
blueprint.overview: [Peek](https://github.com/phw/peek) is an animated GIF screen recorder with an easy-to-use interface. It is available for Linux systems that are running GNOME. It is not a general purpose screencast app with extended features. It focuses on simply creating small screencasts of an area of the screen that are output as a GIF, WebM, or MP4 video.
blueprint.name: Peek
blueprint.title: Peek
